abstract: Egyptian security forces accidentally kill 12 people, including Mexican tourists and Egyptian tour guides, after mistaking group for militants.
lead_paragraph: Police and military forces mistakenly shot at a Mexican tourist convoy while pursuing militants in the country’s Western Desert, killing at least 12 people, officials said.

headline.main: Egypt Security Forces Accidentally Kill Mexican Tourists
headline.print_headline: Egypt Forces Kill Tourists From Mexico

snippet: Police and military forces mistakenly shot at a Mexican tourist convoy while pursuing militants in the country’s Western Desert, killing at least 12 people, officials said.

keywords.value: Sinai Province of the Islamic State
